item.name: Armament Master
item.text: Other Kor creatures you control get +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to Armament Master.
item.flavorText: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

item.name: Arrow Volley Trap
item.text: If four or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {1}{W} rather than pay Arrow Volley Trap's mana cost. Arrow Volley Trap deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

item.name: Bold Defense
item.text: Kicker {3}{W} (You may pay an additional {3}{W} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If Bold Defense was kicked, instead creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike until end of turn.

item.name: Brave the Elements
item.text: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Trust me, your lost fingers and toes are nothing compared to the lost treasures of Sejiri." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

item.name: Caravan Hurda
item.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
item.flavorText: "Not too bright, but good enough for the job required—carrying and walking in a straight line." —Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

item.name: Celestial Mantle
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, double its controller's life total.
item.flavorText: Upon such armor, even a mountain would break.

item.name: Cliff Threader
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: "The crossing demands singular focus. Your life consists of these ropes, these hooks, and these rocky crags. Your past is miles below."

item.name: Conqueror's Pledge
item.text: Kicker {6} (You may pay an additional {6} as you cast this spell.) Put six 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. If Conqueror's Pledge was kicked, put twelve of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

item.name: Day of Judgment
item.text: Destroy all creatures.
item.flavorText: "I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine." —Sorin Markov

item.name: Devout Lightcaster
item.text: Protection from black When Devout Lightcaster enters the battlefield, exile target black permanent.
item.flavorText: "Goddess, grant us light to banish the world's shadows." —Prayer to Kamsa

item.name: Emeria Angel
item.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

item.name: Felidar Sovereign
item.text: Vigilance, lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.
item.flavorText: "If survival is a game, I've seen the winner." —Hazir, Sejiri cartographer

item.name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
item.text: Flying As Iona, Shield of Emeria enters the battlefield, choose a color. Your opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.
item.flavorText: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

item.name: Journey to Nowhere
item.text: When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature. When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.name: Kabira Evangel
item.text: Whenever Kabira Evangel or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may choose a color. If you do, Allies you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

item.name: Kazandu Blademaster
item.text: First strike, vigilance Whenever Kazandu Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kazandu Blademaster.
item.flavorText: "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

item.name: Kor Aeronaut
item.text: Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Kor Aeronaut enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

item.name: Kor Cartographer
item.text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

item.name: Kor Duelist
item.text: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
item.flavorText: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

item.name: Kor Hookmaster
item.text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
item.flavorText: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

item.name: Kor Outfitter
item.text: When Kor Outfitter enters the battlefield, you may attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
item.flavorText: "We take only what we need to survive. Believe me, you will need this."

item.name: Kor Sanctifiers
item.text: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

item.name: Kor Skyfisher
item.text: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

item.name: Landbind Ritual
item.text: You gain 2 life for each Plains you control.
item.flavorText: "Honor this place, for our children's children will stand here and speak these same words again." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

item.name: Luminarch Ascension
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) {1}{W}: Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

item.name: Makindi Shieldmate
item.text: Defender Whenever Makindi Shieldmate or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Makindi Shieldmate.
item.flavorText: The more who rely on him, the more resolute he becomes.

item.name: Narrow Escape
item.text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "A good explorer has to be as slippery as a gomazoa, as tough as a scute bug, and luckier than a ten-fingered trapfinder." —Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

item.name: Nimbus Wings
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.
item.flavorText: Explorers may find ways into the Sky Ruin, but they find its secrets well protected by shifting hedrons and Roil winds.

item.name: Noble Vestige
item.text: Flying {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target player this turn.
item.flavorText: Most spirits are chained to this world by their despair, but he remains tethered by his hope for better days.

item.name: Ondu Cleric
item.text: Whenever Ondu Cleric or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to the number of Allies you control.
item.flavorText: A cleric's true balm is the confidence he inspires in his compatriots.

item.name: Pillarfield Ox
item.flavorText: These stubborn and unpredictable oxen inspire the plains nomads' most colorful curses.

item.name: Pitfall Trap
item.text: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay Pitfall Trap's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature without flying.
item.flavorText: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

item.name: Quest for the Holy Relic
item.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Holy Relic. Remove five quest counters from Quest for the Holy Relic and sacrifice it: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, and attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Shepherd of the Lost
item.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance
item.flavorText: "Should you fall in the wilds, lift your voice to the Sky Realm. The one who answers will be your salvation." —Emeria's Creed

item.name: Shieldmate's Blessing
item.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: "Even land dwellers may call for Emeria's grace in times of need." —Emeria's Creed

item.name: Steppe Lynx
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Steppe Lynx gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Nothing quickens the predator's blood like the unfamiliar scents of new hunting grounds and the mewling cries of new prey.

item.name: Sunspring Expedition
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Sunspring Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Sunspring Expedition and sacrifice it: You gain 8 life.

item.name: Windborne Charge
item.text: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

item.name: World Queller
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a card type. If you do, each player sacrifices a permanent of that type.
item.flavorText: "Why fight the world when you know who will win?" —Nissa Revane

item.name: Æther Figment
item.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Æther Figment is unblockable. If Æther Figment was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Archive Trap
item.text: If an opponent searched his or her library this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay Archive Trap's mana cost. Target opponent puts the top thirteen cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Archmage Ascension
item.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, you may put a quest counter on Archmage Ascension. As long as Archmage Ascension has six or more quest counters on it, if you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Caller of Gales
item.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

item.name: Cancel
item.text: Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: Zendikar's volatile mana is the basis for many spectacular spells—and some equally astonishing failures.

item.name: Cosi's Trickster
item.text: Whenever an opponent shuffles his or her library, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Cosi's Trickster.
item.flavorText: She watches the chaos created by the Roil, seeking strength in the patterns of anarchy.

item.name: Gomazoa
item.text: Defender, flying {T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.
item.flavorText: To explorers, "point man" is a polite way of saying "gomazoa fodder."

item.name: Hedron Crab
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
item.flavorText: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

item.name: Into the Roil
item.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Into the Roil was kicked, draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

item.name: Ior Ruin Expedition
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

item.name: Kraken Hatchling
item.flavorText: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

item.name: Lethargy Trap
item.text: If three or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {U} rather than pay Lethargy Trap's mana cost. Attacking creatures get -3/-0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Suddenly, Zurdi didn't care about treasure, glory, food . . . or the drakes circling above.

item.name: Living Tsunami
item.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Living Tsunami unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: At low tide it slumbers. At high tide it devours.

item.name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
item.text: Whenever Lorthos, the Tidemaker attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
item.flavorText: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.

item.name: Lullmage Mentor
item.text: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may put a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token onto the battlefield. Tap seven untapped Merfolk you control: Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: "Many voices are needed to quiet this land."

item.name: Merfolk Seastalkers
item.text: Islandwalk {2}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
item.flavorText: "Do they seek knowledge or wealth? Are they bandits or benefactors? It depends on who is chanting the tale." —Nikou, Joraga bard

item.name: Merfolk Wayfinder
item.text: Flying When Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Mindbreak Trap
item.text: If an opponent cast three or more spells this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay Mindbreak Trap's mana cost. Exile any number of target spells.
item.flavorText: "Life is a maze. This is one of its dead ends." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Paralyzing Grasp
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
item.flavorText: The Halimar Sea Caves are both the breeding ground of giant squids and the dumping ground of hardened criminals.

item.name: Quest for Ancient Secrets
item.text: Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Ancient Secrets. Remove five quest counters from Quest for Ancient Secrets and sacrifice it: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

item.name: Reckless Scholar
item.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
item.flavorText: "Any good prospector must sift the gold from the sand."

item.name: Rite of Replication
item.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target creature. If Rite of Replication was kicked, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

item.name: Roil Elemental
item.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain control of target creature for as long as you control Roil Elemental.
item.flavorText: A vortex that devours everything—even the souls of the living.

item.name: Sea Gate Loremaster
item.text: {T}: Draw a card for each Ally you control.
item.flavorText: "He's a living library. He remembers everything our band of explorers has seen, and we can use that to our advantage." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

item.name: Seascape Aerialist
item.text: Whenever Seascape Aerialist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The sky is like another sea. It teems with currents, life, and endless possibility."

item.name: Shoal Serpent
item.text: Defender Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It's like a reef that runs aground on ships." —Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

item.name: Sky Ruin Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "Hold up your spears. And try not to look like food." —Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

item.name: Spell Pierce
item.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
item.flavorText: "There's a hole in your plan." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

item.name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
item.text: Flying, shroud You may look at the top card of your library. (You may do this at any time.)
item.flavorText: "Even if the sphinxes do know the location of every relic, getting one to talk is harder than just searching yourself." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

item.name: Sphinx of Lost Truths
item.text: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Sphinx of Lost Truths enters the battlefield, draw three cards. Then if it wasn't kicked, discard three cards.

item.name: Spreading Seas
item.text: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.
item.flavorText: Most inhabitants of Zendikar have given up on the idea of an accurate map.

item.name: Summoner's Bane
item.text: Counter target creature spell. Put a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one." —Jace Beleren

item.name: Tempest Owl
item.text: Kicker {4}{U} (You may pay an additional {4}{U} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Tempest Owl enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap up to three target permanents.

item.name: Trapfinder's Trick
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all Trap cards.
item.flavorText: "At some point, every trapfinder will lose a hunk of flesh. It's just a question of how much—and whether it'll grow back." —Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

item.name: Trapmaker's Snare
item.text: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "Trapmaking is an art. The trap is a corporeal riddle, a battle of wits between its creator and whatever it lures inside."

item.name: Umara Raptor
item.text: Flying Whenever Umara Raptor or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Umara Raptor.
item.flavorText: Messenger, weapon, friend.

item.name: Welkin Tern
item.text: Flying Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: "The sky hedrons are covered with tern nests. It's as though the birds have given up on the land altogether." —Ilori, merfolk falconer

item.name: Whiplash Trap
item.text: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay Whiplash Trap's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

item.name: Windrider Eel
item.text: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The best spot to hook one is right behind the gills." —Rana Cloudwake, kor skyfisher

item.name: Bala Ged Thief
item.text: Whenever Bala Ged Thief or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Allies you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

item.name: Blood Seeker
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
item.flavorText: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.

item.name: Blood Tribute
item.text: Kicker—Tap an untapped Vampire you control. (You may tap a Vampire you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target opponent loses half his or her life, rounded up. If Blood Tribute was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.

item.name: Bloodchief Ascension
item.text: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Bloodchief Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Bloodchief Ascension has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.

item.name: Bloodghast
item.text: Bloodghast can't block. Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Bog Tatters
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: A wraith is a tale of brutal slaying told anew whenever it finds a victim.

item.name: Crypt Ripper
item.text: Haste {B}: Crypt Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The tender light of the living quickens the pulse of the dead.

item.name: Desecrated Earth
item.text: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.
item.flavorText: "The land is swollen with mana, cursed relics, and secrets. If you puncture it, you never know what will burst out." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

item.name: Disfigure
item.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

item.name: Feast of Blood
item.text: Cast Feast of Blood only if you control two or more Vampires. Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "The vampires of this world don't know the pleasures of hunger. They gorge themselves without savoring the kill." —Sorin Markov

item.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
item.text: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.
item.flavorText: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

item.name: Giant Scorpion
item.text: Deathtouch (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide this creature's combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.)
item.flavorText: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

item.name: Grim Discovery
item.text: Choose one or both — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; and/or return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

item.name: Guul Draz Specter
item.text: Flying Guul Draz Specter gets +3/+3 as long as an opponent has no cards in hand. Whenever Guul Draz Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

item.name: Guul Draz Vampire
item.text: As long as an opponent has 10 or less life, Guul Draz Vampire gets +2/+1 and has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
item.flavorText: "A creature's bloodscent is a beacon that cannot be disguised."

item.name: Hagra Crocodile
item.text: Hagra Crocodile can't block. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hagra Crocodile gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The creatures of Zendikar are opportunists, eating whatever is available to them. Like goblins. Or boats.

item.name: Hagra Diabolist
item.text: Whenever Hagra Diabolist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Allies you control.
item.flavorText: "When exploring the darkest regions, wickedness can be the best accomplice of all."

item.name: Halo Hunter
item.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Halo Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target Angel.
item.flavorText: Hanging on the walls of his lair, the fallen halos cast his depravity in everlasting light.

item.name: Heartstabber Mosquito
item.text: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Heartstabber Mosquito enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

item.name: Hideous End
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
item.flavorText: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." —Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

item.name: Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet
item.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature is put into a graveyard this way, put a black Vampire creature token onto the battlefield. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.

item.name: Malakir Bloodwitch
item.text: Flying, protection from white When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

item.name: Marsh Casualties
item.text: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If Marsh Casualties was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

item.name: Mind Sludge
item.text: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
item.flavorText: "Guard your thoughts. You never know who might wish to take them from you." —Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet

item.name: Mindless Null
item.text: Mindless Null can't block unless you control a Vampire.
item.flavorText: Only a bloodchief can create vampires. The rest sire nulls, who become mindless beasts in their former bodies.

item.name: Mire Blight
item.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
item.flavorText: "Is there anything in Guul Draz that doesn't suck the life out of you?" —Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

item.name: Needlebite Trap
item.text: If an opponent gained life this turn, you may pay {B} rather than pay Needlebite Trap's mana cost. Target player loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
item.flavorText: The traps around the vampire city of Malakir hint at the thirst of its inhabitants.

item.name: Nimana Sell-Sword
item.text: Whenever Nimana Sell-Sword or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Nimana Sell-Sword.
item.flavorText: "He asked if I had work for him. No wasn't the right answer." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

item.name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis, the Fallen.
item.flavorText: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

item.name: Quest for the Gravelord
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Put a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Ravenous Trap
item.text: If an opponent had three or more cards put into his or her graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay Ravenous Trap's mana cost. Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

item.name: Sadistic Sacrament
item.text: Kicker {7} (You may pay an additional {7} as you cast this spell.) Search target player's library for up to three cards, exile them, then that player shuffles his or her library. If Sadistic Sacrament was kicked, instead search that player's library for up to fifteen cards, exile them, then that player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Sorin Markov
item.text: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to target creature or player and you gain 2 life. -3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. -7: You control target player's next turn.

item.name: Soul Stair Expedition
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Soul Stair Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Soul Stair Expedition and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Surrakar Marauder
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Surrakar Marauder gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

item.name: Vampire Hexmage
item.text: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.
item.flavorText: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

item.name: Vampire Lacerator
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.
item.flavorText: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

item.name: Vampire Nighthawk
item.text: Flying Deathtouch (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide this creature's combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.name: Vampire's Bite
item.text: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If Vampire's Bite was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

item.name: Bladetusk Boar
item.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
item.flavorText: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

item.name: Burst Lightning
item.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Burst Lightning was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.

item.name: Chandra Ablaze
item.text: +1: Discard a card. If a red card is discarded this way, Chandra Ablaze deals 4 damage to target creature or player. -2: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws three cards. -7: Cast any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard without paying their mana costs.

item.name: Demolish
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land.
item.flavorText: "This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

item.name: Electropotence
item.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Where life and force collide.

item.name: Elemental Appeal
item.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Put a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If Elemental Appeal was kicked, that creature gets +7/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Geyser Glider
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air." —Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

item.name: Goblin Bushwhacker
item.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) When Goblin Bushwhacker enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

item.name: Goblin Guide
item.text: Haste Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into his or her hand.
item.flavorText: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

item.name: Goblin Ruinblaster
item.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Haste When Goblin Ruinblaster enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonbasic land.

item.name: Goblin Shortcutter
item.text: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
item.flavorText: "Goblins are cheap, but be careful. It's a lot easier to steal from a corpse than a customer." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

item.name: Goblin War Paint
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
item.flavorText: War paint made from kolya fruit heightens senses and lessens fear. Unfortunately, fear is usually what keeps you alive.

item.name: Hellfire Mongrel
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to him or her.
item.flavorText: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

item.name: Hellkite Charger
item.text: Flying, haste Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

item.name: Highland Berserker
item.text: Whenever Highland Berserker or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: He gets paid by the axe.

item.name: Inferno Trap
item.text: If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Inferno Trap's mana cost. Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: "Do you smell something burning?"

item.name: Kazuul Warlord
item.text: Whenever Kazuul Warlord or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Ally creature you control.
item.flavorText: On expeditions, minotaurs are worth their weight in gold. Fortunately for their paymasters, most minotaurs don't know how much they weigh.

item.name: Lavaball Trap
item.text: If an opponent had two or more lands enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {3}{R}{R} rather than pay Lavaball Trap's mana cost. Destroy two target lands. Lavaball Trap deals 4 damage to each creature.

item.name: Magma Rift
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Magma Rift, sacrifice a land. Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: "Lighting a fire needs kindling and heat. You be the kindling. I'll bring the heat." —Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Mark of Mutiny
item.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

item.name: Molten Ravager
item.text: {R}: Molten Ravager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Only the foolhardy would venture into the Akoum Mountains without a lullmage to tame the raging rocks and living fires." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

item.name: Murasa Pyromancer
item.text: Whenever Murasa Pyromancer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Murasa Pyromancer deal damage to target creature equal to the number of Allies you control.
item.flavorText: "Fire is my accomplice. For enough coin, it can be yours as well."

item.name: Obsidian Fireheart
item.text: {1}{R}{R}: Put a blaze counter on target land without a blaze counter on it. For as long as that land has a blaze counter on it, it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, this land deals 1 damage to you." (The land continues to burn after Obsidian Fireheart has left the battlefield.)

item.name: Plated Geopede
item.text: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Kor armorers buy the scales and claws. Elf oracles buy the rest." —Nablus, North Hada trapper

item.name: Punishing Fire
item.text: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Pyromancer Ascension
item.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

item.name: Quest for Pure Flame
item.text: Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Pure Flame. Remove four quest counters from Quest for Pure Flame and sacrifice it: If any source you control would deal damage to a creature or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

item.name: Ruinous Minotaur
item.text: Whenever Ruinous Minotaur deals damage to an opponent, sacrifice a land.
item.flavorText: Not every intelligent being is interested in treasure and lost knowledge . . . or even the basics of speech.

item.name: Runeflare Trap
item.text: If an opponent drew three or more cards this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay Runeflare Trap's mana cost. Runeflare Trap deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

item.name: Seismic Shudder
item.text: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: "The land here seems go out of its way to kill you." —Chandra Nalaar

item.name: Shatterskull Giant
item.flavorText: "Now I know why they call it Shatterskull Pass. Rocks fell all night like hammers smashing an anvil. It's no wonder the giants are angry all the time." —Mitra, Bala Ged missionary

item.name: Slaughter Cry
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Since when did ‘AIIIEEEE!' become a negotiation tactic?" —Nikou, Joraga bard

item.name: Spire Barrage
item.text: Spire Barrage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.
item.flavorText: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

item.name: Torch Slinger
item.text: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: Once thrown, twice burned.

item.name: Tuktuk Grunts
item.text: Haste Whenever Tuktuk Grunts or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Tuktuk Grunts.
item.flavorText: Goblins are more aggressive with a crowd to cheer them on.

item.name: Unstable Footing
item.text: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) Damage can't be prevented this turn. If Unstable Footing was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: A long way down is shorter than you think.

item.name: Warren Instigator
item.text: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Danger! Danger! Come out of the safety of your holes!"

item.name: Zektar Shrine Expedition
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Zektar Shrine Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Zektar Shrine Expedition and sacrifice it: Put a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Baloth Cage Trap
item.text: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay Baloth Cage Trap's mana cost. Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Baloth Woodcrasher
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its insatiable hunger quickly depletes a region of prey. It must migrate from place to place to feed its massive bulk.

item.name: Beast Hunt
item.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!" —Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

item.name: Beastmaster Ascension
item.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension. As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

item.name: Cobra Trap
item.text: If a noncreature permanent under your control was destroyed this turn by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {G} rather than pay Cobra Trap's mana cost. Put four 1/1 green Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield.

item.name: Frontier Guide
item.text: {3}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "The elders say Zendikar has no safe, peaceful places. How would they know? They've never looked."

item.name: Gigantiform
item.text: Kicker {4} Enchant creature Enchanted creature is 8/8 and has trample. When Gigantiform enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may search your library for a card named Gigantiform, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Grazing Gladehart
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

item.name: Greenweaver Druid
item.text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.

item.name: Harrow
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

item.name: Joraga Bard
item.text: Whenever Joraga Bard or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Adventuring bards recite Chanter's Epics, never-ending tales that keep their comrades' minds alert to danger.

item.name: Khalni Heart Expedition
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Lotus Cobra
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

item.name: Mold Shambler
item.text: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.
item.flavorText: When civilization encroaches on nature, Zendikar encroaches back.

item.name: Nissa Revane
item.text: +1: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. +1: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control. -7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Nissa's Chosen
item.text: If Nissa's Chosen would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.
item.flavorText: "Nissa will save the elves, but only the ones who have proved their worth."

item.name: Oracle of Mul Daya
item.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card.

item.name: Oran-Rief Recluse
item.text: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Oran-Rief Recluse enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature with flying.

item.name: Oran-Rief Survivalist
item.text: Whenever Oran-Rief Survivalist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Survivalist.
item.flavorText: "I'm strong enough to survive alone. I'm smart enough to want companions at my side."

item.name: Predatory Urge
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to this creature."

item.name: Primal Bellow
item.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
item.flavorText: "A might spell can be handy against baloths, giants, kraken, the Roil—or if you lose your bearings in the woods." —Chadir the Navigator

item.name: Quest for the Gemblades
item.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a creature, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gemblades. Remove a quest counter from Quest for the Gemblades and sacrifice it: Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

item.name: Rampaging Baloths
item.text: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "When the land is angry, so are they." —Nissa Revane

item.name: Relic Crush
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

item.name: River Boa
item.text: Islandwalk {G}: Regenerate River Boa.
item.flavorText: "Sheath your swords! Cudgels only. I see a new pair of waterproof trek boots slithering away." —Nablus, North Hada trapper

item.name: Savage Silhouette
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature."
item.flavorText: Some elves believe that their survival instincts are born of many cycles of reincarnation.

item.name: Scute Mob
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.
item.flavorText: "Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs." —Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

item.name: Scythe Tiger
item.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) When Scythe Tiger enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a land.
item.flavorText: Instead of adapting to its environment, it adapts its environment to itself.

item.name: Summoning Trap
item.text: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay Summoning Trap's mana cost. Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.name: Tajuru Archer
item.text: Whenever Tajuru Archer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Tajuru Archer deal damage to target creature with flying equal to the number of Allies you control.

item.name: Tanglesap
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.
item.flavorText: "The blood of the forest is beholden to no one." —Nissa Revane

item.name: Terra Stomper
item.text: Terra Stomper can't be countered. Trample
item.flavorText: Sometimes violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms are wrongly attributed to the Roil.

item.name: Territorial Baloth
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.

item.name: Timbermaw Larva
item.text: Whenever Timbermaw Larva attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
item.flavorText: "You can't trust your eyes. A tree might look healthy, but its insides tell a different tale." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

item.name: Turntimber Basilisk
item.text: Deathtouch (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide this creature's combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

item.name: Turntimber Ranger
item.text: Whenever Turntimber Ranger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Turntimber Ranger.
item.flavorText: The lone wolf dies alone.

item.name: Vastwood Gorger
item.flavorText: "I've known true ferocity and power. Those brazen ‘planar-walkers' have no idea what wild really means." —Chadir the Navigator

item.name: Vines of Vastwood
item.text: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If Vines of Vastwood was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

item.name: Zendikar Farguide
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: Expeditions follow the paths it leaves in its wake.

item.name: Adventuring Gear
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
item.flavorText: An explorer's essentials in a wild world.

item.name: Blade of the Bloodchief
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. Equip {1}

item.name: Blazing Torch
Carnage Altar
item.text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "In these bloodstains I will find the fingerprints of our oppressors." —Anowon, the Ruin Sage

item.name: Eldrazi Monument
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1, have flying, and are indestructible. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice Eldrazi Monument.
item.flavorText: "Gods don't die. They merely slumber." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

item.name: Eternity Vessel
item.text: Eternity Vessel enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on Eternity Vessel.

item.name: Expedition Map
item.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

item.name: Explorer's Scope
item.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Grappling Hook
item.flavorText: Part tool, part weapon, part of the kor.

item.name: Hedron Scrabbler
item.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Scrabbler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I don't care when the hedrons awoke. Why is the question that really matters." —Anowon, the Ruin Sage

item.name: Khalni Gem
item.text: When Khalni Gem enters the battlefield, return two lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: A fragment of ancient power lost in the heart of Ora Ondar.

item.name: Spidersilk Net
item.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Stonework Puma
item.flavorText: "We suffer uneasy ground, unstable alliances, and unpredictable magic. Something you can truly trust is worth more than a chest of gold." —Nikou, Joraga bard

item.name: Trailblazer's Boots
item.text: Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It's unblockable as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.) Equip {2}
item.flavorText: It's much easier to list the places they haven't been.

item.name: Trusty Machete
item.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {2}
item.flavorText: "Until this expedition is done, that blade is your guardian, your liberator, and your best friend all rolled into one." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

item.name: Akoum Refuge
item.text: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Arid Mesa
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Crypt of Agadeem
item.text: Crypt of Agadeem enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each black creature card in your graveyard.

item.name: Emeria, the Sky Ruin
item.text: Emeria, the Sky Ruin enters the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more Plains, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Graypelt Refuge
item.text: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Jwar Isle Refuge
item.text: Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Kabira Crossroads
item.text: Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped. When Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Kazandu Refuge
item.text: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Magosi, the Waterveil
item.text: Magosi, the Waterveil enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {U}, {T}: Put an eon counter on Magosi, the Waterveil. Skip your next turn. {T}, Remove an eon counter from Magosi, the Waterveil and return it to its owner's hand: Take an extra turn after this one.

item.name: Marsh Flats
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Misty Rainforest
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
item.text: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

item.name: Piranha Marsh
item.text: Piranha Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. When Piranha Marsh enters the battlefield, target player loses 1 life. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Scalding Tarn
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Sejiri Refuge
item.text: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Soaring Seacliff
item.text: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped. When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

item.name: Teetering Peaks
item.text: Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped. When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Turntimber Grove
item.text: Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped. When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

item.name: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle
item.text: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

item.name: Verdant Catacombs
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Island
item.text: U
